listitem.simpara: Added Slowenian translation. Thanks to Boris Mitrovic.
Reduced maximum height of dialogs for parameter analyze commands to fit on smaller screens.
Ignore mouse wheel events while command in progress to avoid error dialogs if multiple wheel events are generated and an auto-run analyze command is still processing the last board change.
Added missing program argument to man pages of gogui-adapter and gogui-terminal.
gogui-terminal: fixed bug that caused a crash in load command; write error message if undo command has arguments
Typos fixed in German internationalization.
gogui-twogtp: do not create a lock file if option -sgffile is not used; fix broken writing to result file on Windows
GoGui: new option -register
Fixed wrong parsing of escaped linebreaks in SGF files that could cause wrong reading of SGF files (bug #3050997)
Made remembering of "Show Info Panel" setting on startup work.
Work around a bug in OpenJDK 1.6.0_20 on Linux that made the saving of GoGui's settings fail.
Don't automatically round the komi to a multiple of 0.5 anymore and show a warning, if an SGF contains a komi that is not a multiple of 0.5 (bug #2990714)
Change Java2D rendering on Windows from DDraw to GDI to avoid repaint errors
Make gogui-adapter correctly forward resign responses to genmove commands (bug #3016960)
Update some standard icons to Tango icons from freedesktop.org
Replaced some simple text files in the distribution, like README and INSTALL, by HTML.
Other small fixes

Fix clearing of board markup if the caret in the comment field or GTP shell changes and no text was selected before and after the change. This made using SQUARE and other markup commands in Live Gfx unusable, because the markup was immediately cleared after the next line from the program's standard error was received. (bug #2964755)
Fix capitalization of open button tooltip
Fix NullPointerException that occured during exporting a PNG image if board labels existed (bug #2989711)

Use more meaningful system properties for displaying the Java runtime name and version in the about and crash dialog (java.runtime.name instead of java.vm.name, if existing, and java.version instead of java.vm.version)
Look for strings like "Black to play" when importing positions from text diagrams.
TwoGtp: use a lock file to check that TwoGtp is not already running with the same result file.
TwoGtp: write game number to standard error at beginning of a game, if option -verbose is used.
New menu item Find Next Comment
Fix parsing of OT property in SGF files that erroneously interpreted Japanese byoyomi as Canadian overtime (which is currently the only time system supported by GTP and GoGui)
Allow to use Reattach Parameters if program is dead but parameter snapshot exists
GoGuiAdapter: forward kgs-genmove_cleanup to the program if it supports it
Small fixes
Fix bug in last release that made GoGui crash if it was started with no program attached (bug #2928104)
Add notes about OpenJDK and Ubuntu 9.10 in the README file.
Don't synchronize the program with GTP commands immediately after navigation in the game tree but only when needed. This speeds up navigation and keeps the GTP log shorter.
Simplify context menu of a point on the board by removing analyze commands with point argument
Support multi-line text in analyze commands of type gfx
New checkbox Reuse text window in analyze dialog
New menu item: Import SGF from Clipboard
New menu items: Snapshot Parameters, Restore Parameters
Enable parameter commands in menu only if the currently attached program has analyze commands of type "param"
No longer install MIME type definition for KDE 3 in installation script on Unix; new version of KDE now support the standard shared MIME database from freedesktop.org
Default installation directory in install.sh is now /usr/local
Use Java 5 language features; older Java versions are no longer supported.

Remove the GmpToGtp adapter, because the Go Modem Protocol and usage of serial ports have become quite obsolete. Should there still be use cases, then a version of GmpToGtp from previous GoGui releases can still be used in combination with a newer version of the GoGui interface.

Use uppercase letters for color arguments in GTP commands (like play or gogui-setup). This was changed for consistency with the convention in the user interface. It could break programs that do not treat colors in a case-insensitive way (in violation of the GTP specification). Such programs can still be used by wrapping their invocation with GtpAdapter with the option -lowercase.
Move menu item Reattach Program from Program to Tools menu.
New menu items Tools / Save Parameters and Reattach With Parameters.
Show stderr output of program in GTP shell, even if the engine is not processing a command (e.g. because it is pondering while waiting for the next command)
New menu item File / Export / PNG Image.
GoGui: handle Go games in XML format. TwoGtp: new option -xml.
GoGui: mark points on board if text is selected in the GtpShell that contains points (like it is already done with text selection in comment or in text windows created by analyze commands)
GoGui: option -analyze is no longer supported
GtpAdapter: option -resign is no longer supported
Rename command line tools using prefix gogui- to avoid conflict with tools from other packages.
Replace sgftotex by gogui-convert, which can read SGF or XML files and supports several output formats
Fast forward or backward if shift key is pressed while the mouse wheel is used
gogui-thumbnail: new option -scale
gogui-twogtp: also measure real time used by programs.
gogui-statistics: new option -random
Automatically restore clock to current node, if it was never running.
Partial translation of the user interface into German. New menu item Help/Switch Language to select the default language.
Ask user whether to continue, if a command in a file sent with "Send File" fails.
Use orange color for standard error lines in GTP Shell that start with "warning:"
